spellTemplateManager.standardTemplateCol: Template border color for standard spells (no duration or concentration), as a hex string (rrggbb)
spellTemplateManager.concentrationTempla: Template border color for spells requiring concentration, as a hex string (rrggbb)
spellTemplateManager.enduringTemplateCol: Template border color for spells with a duration greater than instantaneous, that do not require concentration, as a hex string (rrggbb)
spellTemplateManager.specialTemplateColo: Template border color for spells with a special duration (typically a trigger), that do not require concentration, as a hex string (rrggbb)
spellTemplateManager.unmanagedTemplateAc: What should Spell Template Manager do for unmanaged spell templates?
spellTemplateManager.instantaneousSpellF: Number of additional rounds to display instantaneous spell templates
Check to end concentration templates on all scenes whenever a concentration spell is cast
spellTemplateManager.usingAT.name: Use About Time for template timeout processing
spellTemplateManager.usingAT.hint: Checking this box will disalbe STM processing and offload to the About Time module
spellTemplateManager.enforceConcentratio: If enabled, will remove old concentration templates if a new concentration template is placed
spellTemplateManager.reuseItems.name: Reuse Items
spellTemplateManager.reuseItems.hint: Select to allow placement of multiple templates using the same item or spell
